description: Värmland G-1000 Shirt is a functional, durable work shirt for many types of hunting situations, from the shooting range or the stand to taking care of game. Made in ventilating G-1000 Silent Eco with camouflage print. Perfect as a mid-layer in cold weather or as a light jacket in milder temperatures.
name: Fjallraven Varmland G-1000 Shirt - Mens
